ack.p: We thank Dr. Kiyoshi Kita, Dean and Professor at the School of Tropical Medicine and Global Health, Nagasaki University; Dr. Yoshimasa Tanaka, Assistant Professor at the Center for Therapeutic Innovation, Nagasaki University; and Dr. Simon Croft, Professor at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, all of whom provided insight and expertise that greatly assisted the research.
